attributes.action: Remove VAT from all Registered Charities, so that they become  VAT Excempt.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Charities  find it difficult to exist when they have to find money to pay VAT on things such as Heating, Electric, Goods and Laundry etc that are all used for the purposes of the Charity.

Please help us to make a difference to enable  all Registered Charities to spend all their finances on the purposes for which they exist.
attributes.creator_name: Community of the King of Love
